description: Indulge in our diverse Room Service menu. Weâ€™ve designed our menu so that there is something for everyone, with plenty of healthy choices and tasty treats for good measure.
Mafraq Hotel and Resorts offers laundry, dry cleaning and pressing services to our guests.
Our Housekeeping make sure that rooms are clean, tidy and you have a comfortable stay.

The Concierge staff Mafraq Hotel are available 24 hours a day, and will be happy to assist you in any way they can. Talk to them about your car rentals, ticket confirmation, limousine services, luggage and storage, and valet parking services.

The newly renovated recreation center at Mafraq Hotel offers state-of-the-art equipment from Life Fitness for c. 500 active users.  The building has a built-up-area of 12,309 square feet and includes a mixed-gym and a dedicated gym for ladies.  Fitness Zone provides a full suite of activities for members and day-users.
Although the majority of hotel services are made possible to dial directly, if required any assistance of a telephone operator.
